item.title: Virome Network
item.description: Determining the Pan-African sweet potato virome: understanding virus diversity, distribution and evolution and their impacts on sweet potato production in Africa

item.title: Microbiome Network
item.description: Network models portray the members of a microbial community along with inference about their interactions.

item.title: Tomato Rhizobiome
item.description: Root and the rhizosphere microbiomes associated with productive grafted tomato plants

item.title: Comparing fungal communities using a network approach.
item.description: Comparing fungal communities using a network approach.

item.title: Network analysis of phyllosphere fungal communities
item.description: Exploration of phyllosphere fungal communities of Quercus macrocarpa using network analysis.
